website_summaries.verdict: Create a custom fit with easy adjustments that lend themselves to comfortable rides, even for those very long ones.
pros: Once you find your correct size, you will appreciate a level of comfort not always associated with body protection
Designed to work through all seasons, this protective gear does its job and you may forget you're wearing it
cons: Nailing down the right size seems to be a common complaint among customers

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight, and fits great under my jersey. Price is affordable. The Velcro straps on the sides help to keep the vest in place and snug. It has adjustable straps on the shoulders in case you need it. The protection on the back is fantastic. I'm 5'9" and about 180 lbs. I bought the large and it fits great. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Manzy

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 12 year old great. (5’4 and 115lbs) Haven’t gotten to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest for riding
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my sons who ride on the back of our bikes with us often during the season. They are nice and adjustable which allows them some comfort still while riding. I like that this will give them a little added protection shall the unmentionable happen. They are both as happy as I am with the product!
customer_reviews.author: EKV

customer_reviews.title: Not for street bikes, or any anything like that.
customer_reviews.text: Way to thin to even think about wearing on a street bike. It’s almost like a piece of cardboard with small pieces of plastic on it. No way they would take a hit to the chest or back on the pavement at any speed. Very cheaply made, maybe for paintball or riding a bicycle or something, but for sure not for any motorcycle riding on or off the road. Worse purchase, I’ve never left bad feedback, but being a street bike rider, wanted to let everyone know not to purchase it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: robert hess

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a lot of chest protectors, but this one has all the features I'm looking for as far as comfort and fit. The velcro fasteners cover a big area, so you can really adjust how this fits well. And the elastic has a good amount of stretch so you aren't suffocating yourself. This mainly covers the upper chest and mid-to-upper back, and offers really good freedom of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This riding vest is exquisitely crafted and very sturdy. The protection of the chest and back is very comprehensive, and it looks very cool. It can be used for motorcycle riding, skiing and other activities. I am very satisfied with my shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality product. I accidently bought a medium vs. a large so the only reason I returned mine was to buy a large but I really liked it. I am 5'6 and felt the medium was too short in front, felt like sized for a kid even with the adjustable straps. Returned so I can buy a large. Lightweight perfect for warmer months. Would recommend, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is light weight. I got a medium. I’m 5ft and 175 lbs. probably needed a smaller size. It doesn’t adjust to make it tighter. It’s secured by Velcro. Not sure I like that, would have preferred something else to hold it together. My husband and I both bought one, but returned it because we were looked for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! I love it! I was very skeptical at first because I wanted it to cover more lower from the front. But once I received it and put it on for the first time. It just felt so comfortable and covered the front lower than what the picture shows. I wasn't sure the Large would fit as expected cause I weight 180 and 5'3 in height but it sure did.! I love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a size smaller. It is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large based on my height (5’10” 140lb, skinny dude), but I wish I got a medium. A bit too loose for me (gotta pack on some lbs.). Great fit though, not uncomfortable.

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is wildly inaccuratefeom my experience
customer_reviews.text: The main description is very misleading for fitting sizes. I got the XL as it suggested because I'm 6', 170lbs and very athletic yet the straps for the waist are not adjustable at all and could fit a pillow underneath this thing. The shoulder straps are slightly adjustable but barely do anything. If I cross the straps over to the other side covering the protective plate, THEN it fits like I would want it to...which is annoying. I'm returning this today -kinda feels like that generic Halloween costume that just doesn't fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W.

customer_reviews.title: Just a toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for horseback riding because i didn't want to spend the money for the real deal eventer vest. What a joke! I am horrified to think of anyone buying this as protective gear. However, if you need this for dress up for Halloween, it's nice quality.
